long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the Observic Chrome Extension: Your Tool for Enhanced Meetings and Performance Reviews.

With Observic, representatives can seamlessly capture the essence of in-person meetings on their mobile devices or screen-record vital meetings, calls, or demos using our Chrome extension.

Our AI-powered platform transcribes your uploads, enabling reviewers to employ a range of template competency forms or create custom ones tailored to assess performance, offer comprehensive feedback, and annotate submitted media.

Empower your representatives to take charge of their growth. They can review their own media, seek valuable insights from leaders or coaches, and initiate the development of a robust best practices library.
